summary:
This is second version of of previous \"realistic Digital sun\"
        I have removed lens flare and made it with more higher resolution
        Previous textures are\"512*512\". My Textures are \"1024*1024\"
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=9]
Realistic sun 2
[/size]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-2-1334483436.gif[/img]
[/center]

- In this version the texture resolution is increased from 512*512 to 1024*1024
-Now with more unique colour.
- Looks great with ultra realistic world lightning
-Sun is more bigger than the default one
-I had not given any \"lens flare\",,,so it\'s free from lens flare.
[center]
[size=9]
Mornings are really beautiful
[/size]
[/center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-1-1334483434.gif[/img]




-------Having any problem discuss in comments--------------
author: Hritik
